404.notFound: Oops! The page you're looking for is not found or never existed in the first place.

welcomePage.authorCardContent: I am open to work! Click on card to find me!
welcomePage.members: See at the members of this command project
welcomePage.requestToLogIn: Please, log in or sign up to get access to GraphQL editor.
welcomePage.authors: Welcome to our application, based on graphQL API
welcomePage.author_1: Here will be some information about our TeamLeader. He's a FrontEnd Developer, who learned JS, React, HTML, CSS and another technologies from visual side of web pages. I'm team lead of this project
welcomePage.author_2: Junior Front-end React developer in creating user interfaces with the React library. As well as a systems analyst with experience in the design and development of financial systems.
welcomePage.author_3: I'm a junior front end Developer. I have learnt Java Script, React, html, css. Now I'm finishing RS School and hope my participation in this command project help me to find my first job as a Web Developer. Click on my card to look at my contacts. See you guests!

loginForm.error: An error has occured at Login Page. Details:
loginForm.errorGoogle: Error! Failed log in with Google!
loginForm.undefinedError: Error via log in. Check your data!

errors.passwordCap: Should be at least 1 capitalized letter
errors.passwordChar: Should be at least 1 special character
